label: $SERVICE_NAME for $ARCH
description: A service to deploy EdgeLake with Open Horizon

userInput.name: EDGELAKE_PATH
userInput.label: AnyLog dir path

userInput.name: INIT_TYPE
userInput.label: Whether to deploy AnyLog or shell as a docker container

userInput.name: DISABLE_CLI
userInput.label: Disable CLI

userInput.name: NODE_TYPE
userInput.label: Information regarding which AnyLog node configurations to enable. By default, even if everything is disabled, AnyLog starts TCP and REST connection protocols

userInput.name: NODE_NAME
userInput.label: Name of the AnyLog instance

userInput.name: COMPANY_NAME
userInput.label: Owner of the AnyLog instance

userInput.name: ANYLOG_SERVER_PORT
userInput.label: Port address used by AnyLog's TCP protocol to communicate with other nodes in the network

userInput.name: ANYLOG_REST_PORT
userInput.label: Port address used by AnyLog's REST protocol

userInput.name: ANYLOG_BROKER_PORT
userInput.label: Port address used by AnyLog's Message Broker protocol

userInput.name: TCP_BIND
userInput.label: A bool value that determines if to bind to a specific IP and Port (a false value binds to all IPs)

userInput.name: REST_BIND
userInput.label: A bool value that determines if to bind to a specific IP and Port (a false value binds to all IPs)

userInput.name: BROKER_BIND
userInput.label: A bool value that determines if to bind to a specific IP and Port (a false value binds to all IPs)

userInput.name: DB_TYPE
userInput.label: Physical database type (sqlite or psql)

userInput.name: DB_USER
userInput.label: Username for SQL database connection

userInput.name: DB_PASSWD
userInput.label: Password correlated to database user

userInput.name: DB_IP
userInput.label: Password correlated to database user

userInput.name: DB_PORT
userInput.label: Database port number

userInput.name: SYSTEM_QUERY
userInput.label: Whether to start to start system_query logical database

userInput.name: MEMORY
userInput.label: Run system_query using in-memory SQLite. If set to false, will use pre-set database type

userInput.name: LEDGER_CONN
userInput.label: TCP connection information for Master Node

userInput.name: CLUSTER_NAME
userInput.label: Owner of the cluster

userInput.name: DEFAULT_DBMS
userInput.label: Owner of the cluster

userInput.name: ENABLE_MQTT
userInput.label: Whether to enable the default MQTT process

userInput.name: DEPLOY_LOCAL_SCRIPT
userInput.label: Whether to automatically run a local (or personalized) script at the end of the process

userInput.name: MONITOR_NODES
userInput.label: Whether to monitor the node or not
